Verses: 1 en Janaththai Aatrungal, Thetrungal;

2 erusalemudan Patchamaaippesi, Adhin Pormudindhadhu Endrum, Adhin Akkiramam Nivirththiyaayitru Endrum, Adhu Than Sagala Paavangalinimiththamum Karththarinkaiyil Rattippaai Adaindhu Theerndhadhu Endrum, Adharkuk Koorungal Endru Ungal Dhevan Sollugiraar.
3 karththarukku Vazhiyai Aayaththappaduththungal, Avaandharaveliyile Nammudaiya Dhevanukkup Paadhaiyai Sevvaipannungal Endrum,
4 pallamellam Uyarththappattu, Sagala Malaiyum Kundrum Thaazhththappattu, Konalaanadhu Sevvaiyaagi, Karadumuradaanavai Samamaakkappadum Endrum.
5 karththarin Magimai Veliyarangamaagum, Maamsamaana Yaavum Adhai Egamaaik Kaanum, Karththarin Vaakku Adhai Uraiththadhu Endrum Vanaandharaththile Kooppidugira Saththam Undaayitru.
6 pinnum Kooppittu Sollendru Oru Saththam Undaayitru; Ennaththaik Kooppittu Solvenendren. Adharku: Maamsamellaam Pullaippolavum, Adhin Menmaiyellaam Veliyin Poovaippolavum Irukkiradhu.
7 karththarin Aavi Adhinmel Oodhumpodhu, Pul Ularndhu, Poo Udhirum; Janame Pul.
8 pul Ularndhu Poo Udhirum; Namadhu Dhevanudaiya Vasanamo Endrendraikkum Nirkum Enbadhaiye Sollendru Uraiththadhu.

9 seeyon Ennum Suviseshagiye, Nee Uyarndha Parvadhaththil Eru; Erusalem Ennum Suviseshagiye, Nee Uraththasaththamittuk Kooppidu, Bayappadaamal Saththamittu, Yoodhaa Pattanangalai Nokki: Idho, Ungal Dhevanendru Kooru.

10 idho, Karththaraagiya Aandavar Paraakkiramasaaliyaaga Varuvaar; Avar Thamadhu Buyaththinaal Arasaaluvaar; Idho, Avar Alikkum Balan Avarodekooda Varugiradhu; Avar Kodukkum Pradhibalan Avarudaiya Mugaththukku Munbaaga Sellugiradhu.
11 meyppanaippolath Thamadhu Mandhaiyai Meyppaar; Aattukkuttigalaith Thamadhu Buyaththinaal Serththu, Thamadhu Madiyile Sumandhu Karavalaadugalai Medhuvaai Nadaththuvaar.

12 thanneergalaith Thamadhu Kaippidiyaal Alandhu, Vaanangalai Jaanalavaaip Pramaaniththu, Boomiyin Mannai Marakkaalil Adakki, Parvadhangalaith Thulaakkolaalum, Malaigalaith Tharaasaalum Niruththavar Yaar?
13 karththarudaiya Aaviyai Alavittu, Avarukku Aalosanaikkaaranaayirundhu, Avarukkup Podhiththavan Yaar?
14 thamakku Arivai Unarththavum, Thammai Nyaayavazhiyile Ubadhesikkavum Thamakku Gnaanaththaik Katrukkodukkavum, Thamakku Vivegaththinvazhiyai Arivikkavum, Avar Yaarode Aalosanaipanninaar?
15 idho, Jaadhigal Etrachchaalil Thongum Thulipolavum, Tharaasile Padiyum Thoosipolavum Ennappadugiraargal; Idho, Theevugalai Oru Anuvaippol Thookkugiraar.
16 leebanon Erikkum Viragukkup Podhaadhu; Adhilulla Mirugajeevangal Thaganapalikkum Podhaadhu.
17 sagala Jaadhigalum Avarukku Munbaaga Ondrumillai, Avargal Sooniyaththil Sooniyamaagavum, Maayaiyaagavum Ennappadugiraargal.
18 ippadiyirukka, Dhevanai Yaarukku Oppiduveergal? Endha Saayalai Avarukku Oppiduveergal?
19 kannaan Oru Suroobaththai Vaarkkiraan, Thattaan Ponthagattaal Adhai Moodi, Adharku Vellichchangiligalaip Porundhavaikkiraan.
20 adharkuk Kodukka Vagaiyillaadhavan Uluththuppogaadha Maraththaiththerindhukondu, Asaiyaadha Orusuroobaththai Seyyumpadi Nibunanaana Oru Thachchanaith Thedugiraan.
21 neengal Ariyeergalaa? Neengal Kelvippadavillaiyaa? Aadhimudhal Ungalukkuth Therivikkappadavillaiyaa? Boomi Asthibaarappattadhumudhal Unaraadhirukkireergalaa?

22 avar Boomi Urundaiyinmel Veetrirukkiravar; Adhin Kudigal Vettukkiligalaippola Irukkiraargal; Avar Vaanangalai Melliya Thiraiyaagap Parappi, Avaigalaik Kudiyirukkiradharkaana Koodaaramaaga Virikkiraar.
23 avar Prabukkalai Maayaiyaakki, Boomiyin Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Avaandharamaakkugiraar.

24 avargal Thirumba Naattappaduvadhumillai, Vidhaikkappaduvadhumillai; Avargaludaiya Adimaram Thirumba Boomiyile Verviduvadhumillai; Avargalmel Avar Oodhave Pattuppovaargal; Perungaatru Avargalai Oru Thurumbaippol Adiththukkondupom.
25 ippadiyirukka, Ennai Yaarukku Oppiduveergal? Enakku Yaarai Nigaraakkuveergal? Endru Parisuththar Sollugiraar.

26 ungal Kangalai Ereduththuppaarungal; Avaigalai Sirushtiththavar Yaar? Avar Avaigalin Senaiyai Lakkaththittamaagap Purappadappanni, Avaigalaiyellaam Perperaaga Azhaikkiravaraame; Avarudaiya Magaa Belaththinaalum, Avarudaiya Magaa Vallamaiyinaalum Avaigalil Ondrum Kuraiyaamalirukkiradhu.
27 yaakkobe, Isravele: En Vazhi Karththarukku Maraivaayitru Endrum, En Nyaayam En Dhevanidaththil Ettaamal Pogiradhu Endrum Nee Solvaanen?

28 boomiyin Kadaiyaandharangalai Sirushtiththa Karththaraagiya Anaadhidhevan Sorndhupovadhumillai, Ilaippadaivadhumillai; Idhai Nee Ariyaayo? Idhai Nee Kettadhillaiyo? Avarudaiya Buththi Aaraaindhu Mudiyaadhadhu.
29 sorndhupogiravanukku Avar Belan Koduththu, Saththuvamillaadhavanukku Saththuvaththaip Perugappannugiraar.
30 ilaignar Ilaippadaindhu Sorndhupovaargal, Vaalibarum Idarivizhuvaargal.
31 karththarukkuk Kaaththirukkiravargalo Pudhuppelanadaindhu, Kazhugugalaippola Settaigalai Adiththu Ezhumbuvaargal; Avargal Odinaalum Ilaippadaiyaargal, Nadandhaalum Sorndhupogaargal.
